titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of a Peace Garden on a site to be selected by the Secretary of the Interior.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the Peace Garden Project, Inc., which permits the Project to establish a Peace Garden in the District of Columbia, to honor the commitment of the people of the United States to world peace. Requires Federal approval of design plans. Prohibits Federal financial participation. Terminates such authority if construction is not begun within five years of this Act's enactment.
